titles.title: A bill to extend until January 1, 1995, the existing suspension of duty on certain piston engines.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S1892)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 2/18/1993--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend, through December 31, 1994, the suspension of duty on certain piston engines.
